name: Hollywood Hero: Comeback
description:
"Hollywood hero: Comeback" game allows you to try out a Hollywood actor role again. This time, the scenery of ancient temples was replaced by futuristic cities bathed in neon light. Shoot the robots and flying drones, avoid the shots of blasters. Gems will increase your box office receipts, and Oscars will give you a pass to the next level. Be careful, sometimes there can be a deadly danger behind movie decorations! Overcome all the difficulties on the way to becoming a Hollywood hero and become a superstar again!

Game Features:
  • - Fun setting
  • - Old school gameplay
  • - Awesome pixel art graphics
  • - Steam Achievements support
  • - Great game soundtrack
